Rebel turned top food writer and head chef of the successful Kensington Place restaurant in London; Rowley Leigh tells Flora Bradwell what student cuisine was like in his day

The Bay Horse, Fulford

Caffe Uno

Garden of India

The Cockpit, Leeds

Which Cake?

Yes, its that time of the year again. Valentine's Day has come and gone, and due to the lack of tacky pink fluffy nonsense falling on your doormat; it is highly likely that you'll be resorting to full fat sugary goodness to fill your emotional void. We feel your pain! In sympathy with the lack of romantic attentions that most single people are suffering from at this lonely time (reminiscent of pensioners at christmas), MUSE has gone on a quest to find the best desserts to raise your seratonin levels.

Langwith, Carrot Cake, 55p

Costcutter, "Aero" Chocolate Mousse, two for 45p

Alcuin, Danish Pastry, 65p

YSTV spend next year's budget on reality show

York's Roasters back on campus

Deep Fraud Thrombosis

Scandalous embezzlement buys SU two private jets but all turns sour for presedent

Nicki Letts gives you the definitive guide to finding housing for your second year.

Elizabeth Ward gets interview tips from Recruitment Manager Anna Burrows

Elegantly Wasted

James looks back over 40 glorious years of nouse, using lots of words that no-one else understands

The Student Counsel

A successful and distinguished history?

For 40 years, nouse has been breaking the biggest stories on campus and spearheading radical campaigns, so Nicki Letts and Dan Phillips trawled the archive for some of the highlights

Living fitness fantasies

Gyms and jogging aren't too tempting when it's time for New Year's resolutions again, prompting Sebastian Knox and Jo-ann Hodgson to investigate less traditional ways to keep fit

Leigh Matthews talks to the founder of 'Aesthetica,' York's new arts magazine

Minster's financial plight

After a chance meeting with an elderly lady and a chat with the Chapter Steward, Sam Fugill realises the true extent of the financial troubles facing York Minster.
